title: Aquarian Dream - Fantasy - [1978 - MP3 - 320 kbps][vigoni]
description:
Aquarian Dream moved from Buddah to Elektra with their second album, Fantasy. With lead vocalist Gloria Jones having left the band, a new singer, Sylvia Striplin, was added. (Striplin would be gone by the third album, Chance to Dance).
